individualDesignText: Based on the wishes and desires of each of our customers, we provide clothing with a design that matches their brand.
deliveryText: Provides delivery services for customers throughout  world
speedText: One of our main goals is to prepare our customers' orders as quickly as possible
warrantyText: We guarantee from 6 to 24 months, depending on the type of order
korkCompanyText: The company <<Kork>> was established in 2020. The main task of the company is to offer a wide range of high-quality, popular and modern work clothes to local enterprises, firms, manufacturing enterprises.
korkCompanyText2: In the preparation of our products, we attach great importance to the fact that work clothes are comfortable for the employee and protect them from external influences, as well as comply with the rules of sanitary hygiene. Another function of special clothing is to define the company's reputation and corporate culture. Especially in the field of service, it is the face of special clothing companies and acts as the main link with the consumer. That's why we also offer individual design services that match our clients' brand image and values. In this way, we ensure that the companies that use our service have an effective relationship with their customers
korkCompanyMedia: DMF company (Doromad Munira Fayz) develops and manufactures special clothing and work shoes, supplies personal protective equipment and related products from leading world brands. The assortment includes more than ten thousand products for work and active recreation, all sectors of the economy and any working conditions
footerText: Leave your information for effective cooperation with us and get a free consultation
